description: France and Britain waged war against Germany far from northern Europe, successfully wresting its African colony of Kamerun, now Cameroon.
title: Three Thousand Miles From the Western Front
title_page: Three Thousand Miles From the Western Front - The New York Times
maintext:
“The French School in Duala: Some of the future citizens of the colony getting their first lessons in French. The teacher is a French officer.”
Credit... The New York Times Mid-Week Pictorial, May 17, 1917
